x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

MindTrack is a ServiceNow-powered school wellbeing coordination platform connecting teachers, counselors, NGOs, and government health teams.

  • App Engine: Records behavioral or health-related incidents

  • HRSD: Assigns counselors, mentors, or outreach workers

  • Virtual Agent: 24/7 confidential student support and resource center

  • Performance Analytics: Tracks wellbeing indicators across schools

  • Flow Designer: Escalates high-risk cases automatically to health or social services

This creates a proactive, data-driven ecosystem that prevents crisis before it happens.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  1. Integration with school management systems, health databases, and NGO helplines;
  2. secure data privacy compliance (HIPAA, GDPR equivalent); 
  3. mobile app access for students and counselors.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Data privacy and parental consent regulations

  • Limited digital literacy in rural schools

  • Need for stakeholder coordination between ministries, NGOs, and schools
